item.description:
Hey ladies,

I apologize for the late notice but I had to see how many RSVPs I had before opening this up.

I am having a get together tonight at my house for girls only. It is a holiday celebration with a $10 yankee swap...if you want to participate.

It is also BYOB. Other than that there will be goodies to enjoy. Feel free to stop by and meet the group. So far there are about 8-10 of us that will be there.

Anytime after 6:30 if fine. Feel free to email me or call me for directions.
kristie.goodgion@genzyme.com
774-239-4450
item.name: Girls X-Mas Party
